answers.answer: And it's supposed to be THE group lol....
I am considered high risk due to history of gestational diabetes and insufficient cervix. I'm sorry you've had to go through so much! I pray this one goes well for you!!
Yes i'm considered high risk because of my weight and medical history too. Hope everything goes great for you though!

Yes i am considered hight risk becuase of my blood clotting disorders i have to take lovenox everyday which is a blood thinning shot and see a hight risk doctor (perinitolgist) every two weeksgood luck and i am praying for youxoxoxogina
I think im high risk too, im scared to even ask...
I'm high risk due to incompetence cervix. I will have a cerclage at 12 weeks to help my cervix.
I am also considered high risk.  I had 2 second trimester losses & 2 very early losses.  I go back on Wednesday to check for a multiple pregnancy.
I am considered high risk due to being baby number 6 and my 4th baby was born at 35 weeks.

i am considered high risk for a few reasons. 1. i have polycystic ovarian disease/syndrome. 2. cramping and bleeding (since 6 weeks) 3. abnormal gestational sac shape :(But my doctors are monitoring me closely and have regular ultrasounds scheduled for viability and reassurance.

question: Hi Ladies :)I was just curious if anyone else was high risk.  I know I am.  I delivered a still born little boy at 28 weeks in May of 2008.  After that, my next pregnancy was a blighted ovum and my third pregnancy which produced the love of my life Vaun was much quicker than expected.  He was born with Down Syndrome 6 1/2 weeks early.  Fingers crossed for this one :)  I don't go for my first u/s until Dec 13th.
title: Anyone else in thr group considered to be high risk?
